ValidationRule.description: NOT allow a CSR to place a case On Hold, On Hold CBT, On Hold CBT Z7 (so any hold status) if the case has an Owner of “Aero Default” & Case Record types: Repair & Overhaul Orders Quotes OEM
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,"On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"On Hold CBT"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"On Hold CBT Z7")),OR($RecordType.Name="Repair & Overhaul",$RecordType.Name="Quotes",$RecordType.Name="Orders",$RecordType.Name="OEM Quotes Orders",$RecordType.Name="ReturnsPRO",$RecordType.Name="Returns",$RecordType.Name="Internal Escalations",$RecordType.Name="General"),OwnerId = '005300000042rPL',$Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser',$Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have a Case On Hold when Aero Default is the Case Owner
